column4: Hey, Takumi. Come to make some pois- I mean potions?
H-Hey, Yugamu. Actually, I... had something I wanted to talk to you about.
Yes? I'm listening.
Well, actually...
This is a lot more embarrassing than I thought it would be.
But I have to tell him before someone else does and he gets the wrong idea.
There was a misunderstanding with the girls, and now they think I like you.
But I don't! I mean, I do like you, Yugamu, but not in that way.
Sorry, this isn't coming out right.
Hmm...
How about you start from the beginning?
I explained to Yugamu how Tsubasa, Karua, and Kyoshika all had dreams about kissing me, and I had dreams about kissing all three of them.
But they were already at each other's throats, and telling them the truth about my dreams would just create problems. So... I lied.
I'm really sorry about this, Yugamu. I'm sure it'll blow over in a few days.
Oh, I'm not worried about that.
You aren't?
I'm more interested to hear why you said you had a dream about me.
Huh?
You could have said anyone else, but you chose me. Why?
Out of everybody, I thought you'd be...
Yes?
I thought you'd be the least upset about it.
You're really open about... this sort of thing.
You mean love and attraction?
Yeah, I guess.
Back on the TRC, I didn't have anyone to talk to about things like crushes and love or whatever.
It's not like I could talk to Karua about any of that stuff...
Maybe that's why it still seems so embarrassing.
I've always admired how forward you are about... all of it.
Oh, Takumi...!
Don't make it weird.
You're the one who told a bunch of girls you had a dream about kissing me.
I said I was sorry about that.
Hehehe.
But are you sure that's the only reason?
What do you mean?
You've never thought about kissing me?
I've thought about kissing you, you know.
What?!
Oh, don't look so scandalized. It can't be helped, we're young and hormonal, and you're all so cute.
Are you certain you didn't say you had a dream about kissing me because subconsciously, you'd like to try it?

yes
